static_functions.name: Call
static_functions.description: Calls an Event which will be triggered in all Local Packages

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to trigger the event

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the event

static_functions.name: CallRemote
static_functions.description: Calls an Event if on Client which will be triggered in all Server Packages

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to trigger the event

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the event

static_functions.name: CallRemote
static_functions.description: Calls an Event if on Server which will be triggered in all Client's Packages of a specific Player

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to trigger the event

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The remote player to send this event

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the event

static_functions.name: BroadcastRemote
static_functions.description: Calls an Event on Server which will be triggered in all Client's Packages of all Players

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to trigger the event

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the event

static_functions.name: BroadcastRemoteDimension
static_functions.description: Calls an Event on Server which will be triggered in all Client's Packages of all Players in that dimension

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: The Dimension to send this event

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to trigger the event

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the event

static_functions.name: Subscribe
static_functions.description: Subscribes for an user-created event which will be triggered for only local called events

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to subscribe

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function to execute

static_functions.name: SubscribeRemote
static_functions.description: Subscribes for an user-created event which will be triggered for only remote called events

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to subscribe

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function to execute

static_functions.name: Unsubscribe
static_functions.description: Unsubscribes from all subscribed events in this Package with that event name, optionally passing the function to unsubscribe only that callback

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to unsubscribe

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function to unsubscribe

static_functions.name: UnsubscribeRemote
static_functions.description: Unsubscribes from all subscribed remote events in this Package with that event name, optionally passing the function to unsubscribe only that callback

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to unsubscribe

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function to unsubscribe
